reviews.review: Ei, pq vc ai ainda n comprou? Compra logo, vc n vai se arrepender!

So you wanted a horror game. Little bit of PVP, little bit of action. 

Maybe you just liked some of the IPs being used. 

Or, maybe you just wanted to know what it was like to be on the other side of the knife for once. 

This is probably the game for you.
makes me have srs anger issue but i cant stop playing
lil funny clown go boing boing

Bueno este juego lo empece a jugar hace poco, al principio se me hacia medio aburrido pero luego me fue gustando jugando. 

Si queres pasar un rato de diversiÃ³n con tus amigos online lo recomiendo mucho. Lo Ãºnico es que agreguen mÃ¡s mapas porque se esta haciendo muy repetitivo y luego ya te sabes de memoria los mapa. 

Si lo llegas a ver en oferta no dudes en comprarlo!!!!

very good game I have fun everytime I play it.

El juego en general es bueno y estÃ¡ bien planteado, pero estÃ¡ desbalanceado, si un superviviente se esconde por mucho tiempo, aparecen los cuervos sobre el, pero si el killer te face campea en el gancho, mueres igual.
Por otra parte, si te vienen con una premade, y eres killer, no tienes chances a nada, y hagas lo que hagas, siempre siendo killer vas a ser camper,manco, o no haces nada en la partida porque los supervivientes quieren salir todos vivos y que te loopeen todo lo que quieran...

I got this game like 3 days ago, and already I have 24 hours into it. This game is super addicting, and several trials are some of the most tense, most terrifying experiences I have had. I seriously recommend this game.
This community is so nice I got a lot of tips to uninstall the game and kill myself

Game is good, but a lot of the times, a lot of toxic players. Devs don't tend to listen to their community too well, the second something is done or changed, another thing goes wrong etc, but other than that.. the amount of licenses they get for infamous franchises (Resident Evil, Silent Hill etc)

If a solo player I recommend killer, otherwise swf it up as a survivor, either way, get ready for a mix of fun and salt.

PS you may need to take breaks due to sheer frustration, the highs are high but the lows are incredibly low.
